name: Cost Center Profit Analysis
query:
SELECT
'Income' as "Account:Data:300" ,
sum(base_rounded_total) as "Amount:Currency:120"
from `tabSales Invoice`
where docstatus = 1
and cost_center = %(cost_center)s 
UNION ALL
SELECT 
item_code as Account,
-1*sum(STED.basic_amount) as Amount
from `tabStock Entry Detail` as STED
INNER JOIN `tabStock Entry` as STE
ON STE.name =STED.parent
AND STED.cost_center = %(cost_center)s 
AND STE.purpose = 'Material Issue'
AND STE.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY STED.item_code
UNION ALL
SELECT
JED.account as Account,
-1 * sum(JED.debit_in_account_currency) as Amount
FROM `tabJournal Entry Account` as JED
INNER JOIN `tabJournal Entry` as JE
ON JE.name = JED.parent
and JED.cost_center = %(cost_center)s
group by JED.account
UNION ALL
SELECT
CONCAT('Working Hours-' ,round(sum(total_hours),1)) as Account,
-1 * sum(total_costing_amount) As Amount
FROM `tabTimesheet` 
WHERE docstatus = 1
and cost_center_cf = %(cost_center)s
